summary: Dare you discover the mysteries of the Lament Configuration Box?
descriptionHtml:
This is a quest mod based on the Hellraiser Movies. The player will take on Pinhead and his Cenobites and stop them from making their Hell on Tamriel. To Start the quest talk to the Mysterious Man in the Bannered Mare Inn at Whiterun.

This mod requires dialogue subtitles to be turned on. There shouldn\'t be any compatibility issues.

Mod cleaned with TES5Edit

Installation:

Unrar, copy and paste everything to the data folder, check pinhead.esp in data files and play.

V1.2: Added a missing boss mesh I forgot .

V1.3: Added custom Cenobite armor, improved skinless and weapon textures and splattered dungeon with blood.

v1.4: Added Hook weapons for Pinhead and expanded dungeon. Improved skinless textures even more by adding normal maps.
author: Morrowind1979
